MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 24-NOV-2020 13:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY21 postcode area of Guilsfield, affecting properties in Groesllwyd, Rock Terrace and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30 am to replace faulty equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1:00 pm. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:29 am on 24th November, 2020.
